function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accumulated response of NPL/L to variable shocks in Singapore banks","Impact":"Potential increase in NPL/L due to macroeconomic shocks","Mitigation":"Implementing risk management strategies to mitigate the impact of macroeconomic shocks","Technologies":"Risk management software and predictive analytics","People":"First and second group of banks in Singapore","Owner":"Bank management and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of unpredictable shock to GDP on NPL/L in Philippines banks","Impact":"Positive impact on NPL/L of Group 1 banks","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to stabilize NPL/L in response to GDP shocks","Technologies":"Economic forecasting tools and stress testing models","People":"Banks in Group 1 in the Philippines","Owner":"Economic analysts and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Response of NPL/L to shocks in Malaysia banks","Impact":"Unspecified impact of the variable shocks on NPL/L","Mitigation":"Conducting detailed analysis and scenario planning to understand the impact of variable shocks on NPL/L","Technologies":"Financial modeling software and scenario analysis tools","People":"Both groups of banks in Malaysia","Owner":"Bank executives and financial analysts"}]}
